alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Floyd; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 3:17PM CST until March 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Des Moines IA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Winnebago River at Mason City affecting Cerro Gordo, Floyd and Worth Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Winnebago River at Mason City. * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, There is widespread flooding of city parks and water reaches the underside of the 12th Street Northeast bridge at the piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CST Monday the stage was 9.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 10.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
